you can hit it like 5 times per cycle instead of 3

i thought it was like, 1 extra hit
Alright, so, I was looking at the hall of fame for a bit, and
what do you meannnnnsomeone has a 500+ hour clear of noesis final boss, WHAT

the biggest rng factor is at the end

nah, its like 4 minutes or smth

so I just got to the famous attack in magician's operation

you move left on the first note of that part
the one where luka protects the kid
but mir what if max just all of a sudden goes deaf in this grind
I feel like as long as your cue works it doesnt matter

like how does your brain not instantly registed yup I do that on that part of the song

now that would be a nightmare

when is someone making baba is you in baba is you

doing everything is code is just so much more convenient ngl

max real quick i need you to make fun of razzors practice tools
the fun factor is not part of the argument
jtooling really really long save is cheating
honestly using practice tools to learn Melanzana seems more reasonable than learning it from scratch with nothing

imo you should use practice tools on anything if you feel like it
Didn't we agree that u just don't compare clears with and without practice used
So the anti practice crowd can invalidate ur clears but u can consider them legit
speedrunners cheat bc they use practice tools to get better at runs
beat ch9 golden without any practice Keepo
waiting for Razzor to do Melanzana no practice tools cornBlack
max im going to make fun of you om razzors behalf if you dont make fun of razzor practice tooling right now
i aint changing my stance regardless of how many people perceive it as retarded
i am fully aware that its retarded
the way we get there matters in this case imo
I see it more of an old way of thinking
it's just too huge of a difference
I spent 300 hours, you used practice; We are not the same
at the end of the day, what matters is that you accomplish the avoidance from start to finish
not using practice tools = just learning the thing more inefficiently
you don't spend nearly the same amount of time as normal play
tbh max you can't say that what you did is just as hard as doing the game w/o practice
it's like "no i'm better at minecraft than you bc i spent 200 hours mining all my iron and you used an iron farm"
you still did it, but it's not the same
razzor a17 also said maxs clear wasnt valid so ur agreeing to him
if i pull a morgz and clear melan in 1 hour is my clear valid?
bruh you just spent more time doing it it's just as difficult
That depends on how you define difficulty
the only difference will be the d/t
And learning is a type of difficulty
cthaere's argument is what i was trying to put into words
using vs. not using practice tools is always ultimately down to which way is more fun
out of any other avoidance i've played
honestly if practice tools invalidate a clear then so would watching a video
this genuinely feels like practice tools is cheating
learning the muscle memory is just such a major part of it
Melanzana is mostly learning difficulty, execution diff is high and reading diff is 0
okay but consider: melanzana is a copium factory
yeah actually you know, its cheating if you have played the avoidance for more than one attempt. After that you have practiced so its cheating
So practice is far more of an impact in that regard
fluking melanzana in 1 attempt is cheating
npesta didn't actually clear kenos guys he didn't learn the level from the start
and hey Max, it's not bad so far right
i guess i come from a point of copium
it's effectively the purist argument, which takes place in a lot of arguments and really doesn't go anywhere because it's fun vs purism lol
I feel like we need an avoidance equivalent of JGB making the shiftup rant in serious the other day
you were pretty happy 1 hour ago
question, is the misserableness comparable to starting sonic wave from the beginning
finna pack practice tools with every avoidance i make ever to piss off purists

if its ingame then its still purism

add a hitcount mode for practice
if you practice mode in gd, cheating

what are the purists gonna say then
i don't really like the fact that i'm being called retarded btw
but the amount of people telling me that im a dumbass and making fun of me isn't very pleasing
youre using a third party edit of the game to essentially make the process of clearing the game 1000x easier
I'm trying not to insult anyone, because that's beyond the clear being legitimate or not, but I do not agree with your point at all razzor
Time to never finish a game again
you are being biased then though
Sorry razzor I don't make the rules
ur practicing ur game when ur making it
idk i see where razzor is coming from and i kinda actually agree with him

I'm having two other discussions at the same time so I can't weigh in much, but I agree that using third party software to make this easier is fundamentally cheating, and I also think that the achievement is literally easier
however I don't think it makes sense so single out this game
the time you spend arguing about practice tools you could've gotten better at the game
Don't think you should be made fun of for it, just not a fan of the purism argument as it's pretty anti-fun and puts down other people's achievements
Personally, I think this is the most morally acceptable avoidance to practice
Max using practicetool lead to dungeon 2 being canceled

finally we can make our own dungeon

The practice tool argument is literally just a game of semantics and subjective perspectives
I really dont get how being against practice tools is even a thing in aiwanas, when in like any other "hardcore gaming" community, its seen as the most mundane thing ever
it is more impressive to do melanzana without practice
zero thinks that because eruna has a practice tool
obviously no practice is more impressive
however, the run is the same and learning it is simply less annoying
@Taprus_ Aiwanas are very incomparable to most hardcore gaming communities
zero still thinks practice tooling other games is cheating as long as its decompiled
@Taprus_ yeah bc iw players are fucking stupid
the single fact that 2 melanzana clears can be seen as day and night due to the circumstances of how they were cleared is enough for me to consider
@Taprus_ Have you seen a single GD kid
@Mir_iw that changes my view of this massively
I was considering more things like shmups
granted, playing shmups without practice is genuinly miserable
i guess my argument comes from a place of practice tools being taboo and the fact u get shat on for using them in the jp community (which i often interact with!)
at one point it used to be dislike in the majority
you telling me we could've avoided so many arguments but didnt just because someone chose for them?
when I apologized to everyone noone cared
except for bakudan, but I explained the situation and then he didn't care either
who the hell is matsu jobs
i guess i have some kind of ptsd from the mir incident

okay here's the thing about people caring about your clear being practice tool

but it's also super not the same as not using them
people should just play their games however they want
day 3 of telling max "what happened to 2 hours a day"
